name: Deeper Inside LD48
description:
Deeper Inside is a Visual Novel where you are a depressed person.
Will you face your past in your deep dreams to reform yourself?
It is up to you. 

It has 3 major unique endings.

It is made for Ludum Dare 48.

HOW TO PLAY

In order to play you have to use keyboard keys.

[P] to play on menu or [E] to exit game on any screen.

[Spacebar] to proceed through lines and [A],[B] and [C] when the choices are available to choose. Press corresponding key and then press spacebar to proceed.
